name: DYO (itch)
description:
1-2 PLAYER LOCAL CO-OP PUZZLE PLATFORMER
DYO is a
cooperative platformer
for one or two players
where you can hop between
two halves of a split screen. Navigate two Minotaurs through
a seemingly impassable maze
and solve mind-bending puzzles
to reach the exit. Supported input:
Controllers / Keyboard
2 players recommended! (Purchase includes Steam key) Steam | Twitter | Facebook | Presskit
